long_description: With a weight of 4 lbs. and a compressed size of 11 x 11 x 5 in., the Advanced Elements PackLite Inflatable Kayak lets you explore remote waters when you're traveling or hiking. Polyurethane-coated ripstop polyester with welded seams offers a compressible, tough hull. Easy to use Twistlok(TM) and one-way valves offer easy inflation. Includes a rubber molded handle, on-deck gear storage, and D-rings for tie downs. The Advanced Elements PackLite Inflatable Kayak includes a mesh storage bag that doubles as an on-deck gear bag.
short_description: With a weight of 4 lbs. and a compressed size of 11 x 11 x 5 in., the Advanced Elements PackLite Inflatable Kayak lets you explore remote waters when you're traveling or hiking.
